import React from 'react' import './Registration.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Registration({onRegister}){ const isValid = true const [values, setValues] = React.useState({}); function handleChange(e) { const { value, name } = e.target; setValues({ ...values, [name]: value }); } function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault(); onRegister({ password: values.password, email: values.email, name: values.name, }); } return (

Welcome!

); } export default Registration;
